s0106: Therefore King Wu announced to all the lords: 'Yin has grave crimes, we cannot but completely attack them.'
s0107: He followed King Wen, and led 300 war chariots, 3,000 tiger warriors, 45,000 armored soldiers, to attack Zhou eastward.
s0108: In the eleventh year, twelfth month, day wuwu, the army all crossed Mengjin, all the lords assembled.
s0110: King Wu made the Great Oath, announced to the multitudes: 'Now the Yin king Zhou uses the words of his women, cuts himself off from Heaven, destroys his three officials, separates from his royal parents and brothers, discards his ancestors' music, makes licentious sounds, uses them to change and confuse proper sounds, delights in women.'
s0111: Therefore now I Fa will jointly execute Heaven's punishment.
s0112: Strive, gentlemen, it cannot be done twice, cannot be done three times!'
s0114: In the second month, day jiazi at dawn, King Wu arrived at the Shang suburb of Muye, and made the oath.
s0115: King Wu held the yellow axe in his left hand, white banner in his right, to command.
s0116: He said: 'Distant are the people of the western lands!'
